Meetings

  • {{ meeting.name }}

    {{ meeting.startDate | date }} to {{ meeting.endDate | date }}

    {{ meeting.description }}

{{ isEditing ? 'Edit' : 'Add' }} Meeting

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Meeting } from 'src/Models/Meeting'; import { MeetingService } from 'src/services/meeting.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { meetings: Meeting[] = []; currentMeeting: Meeting; userId: number; isEditing= true; constructor( private meetingService: MeetingService ) { let localUserId = localStorage.getItem("userId"); if (localUserId !== null && localUserId !== undefined) { this.userId = +localUserId; this.getAll(this.userId) } } ngOnInit(){ } getAll(userId: number){ this.meetingService.getAll(userId).subscribe( (response) => { this.meetings = response as Meeting[]; console.log(this.meetings); }, (error) => { console.log(error); }); }; }
